#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define MAXN 100010
#define LL long long
int N;
int Candies[MAXN];
int calc(int val)
{
	LL res = 0;
	for(int i = 0;i<N;i++)
	{
		if(Candies[i]+res<val){
			return 0;
		}
		else
		{
			res -= val - Candies[i];
		}
	}
	return 1;
}
int main()
{
	ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);
	int Testcases;
	cin>>Testcases;
	for(int Case = 1;Case<=Testcases;Case++)
	{
		cin>>N;
		for(int i = 0;i<N;i++)
			cin>>Candies[i];
		int L = 0;
		int R = 1e9;
		int M,res;
		while(L<=R)
		{
			M = (L+R)/2;
			if(calc(M))
			{
				L = M+1;
				res = M;
			}
			else
				R = M-1;
		}
		cout<<res<<endl;
	}
	return 0;
}
